source: ## This note book contains data transformations using SQL
#### Load all required dataframes and convert them to temp sql views

%%pyspark

# setup the temp tables we need for the classenrolments table
sourcep = oea.stage2p

# used for classenrolment view
factsubjectenrolment_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/enrolment/DMFactSubjectEnrolment_pseudo", format='delta')
dmactivity_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/enrolment/DMActivity_pseudo", format='delta')
dmsubject_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/enrolment/DMSubject_pseudo", format='delta')
dmpersondemographic_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/student/DMPersonDemographic_pseudo", format='delta')
dmyearlevel_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/ACER/DMYearLevel_pseudo", format='delta')
dmcampus_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/ACER/DMCampus_pseudo", format='delta')
dmdate_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/ACER/DMDate_pseudo", format='delta')
dmcalendaryear_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/ACER/DMCalendarYear_pseudo", format='delta')

# used for active student view
factpersonmilestone_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/student/DMFactPersonMilestone_pseudo", format='delta')
dmrollgroup_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/enrolment/DMRollGroup_pseudo", format='delta')

# create temp sql views
factsubjectenrolment_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_factsubjectenrolment')
dmactivity_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_dmactivity')
dmsubject_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_dmsubject')
dmpersondemographic_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_dmpersondemographic')
dmyearlevel_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_dmyearlevel')
dmcampus_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_dmcampus')
dmdate_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_dmdate')
dmcalendaryear_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_dmcalendaryear')
factpersonmilestone_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_factpersonmilestone')
dmrollgroup_df.createOrReplaceTempView('vw_dmrollgroup')
#### Create the SQL temp views from the loaded dataframes

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_classenrolment
AS
SELECT cy.Year AS CalendarYear,
    C.SchoolId AS AGEID,
    c.CampusSuburbAndName,
    student.FirstName  AS  StudentFirstName,
    student.LastName AS StudentLastName,
    Student.Ceider,
    yl.YearLevelSifDesc AS YearLevel,
    s.SubjectShortName AS Subject,
    a.ActivityName AS  ClassName,
    a.ActivityCode AS ClassCode,
    ClassStartDate.date AS ClassStartDate,
    ClassEndDate.date AS ClassEndDate,
    staff.FirstName AS StaffFirstName,
    staff.LastName AS StaffLastName,
    c.CompassSchoolURL

    FROM vw_factsubjectenrolment f
    JOIN vw_dmactivity a ON f.SKActivity = a.SKActivity
    AND a.ActivityTypeDescription = 'Standard Class'
    JOIN vw_dmsubject s ON f.SKSubject = s.SKSubject
    JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic student ON f.SKStudent = student.SKPerson
    JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic staff ON f.SKStaff = staff.SKPerson
    JOIN vw_dmyearlevel yl ON f.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel
    JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON f.SKCampus = c.SKCampus
    JOIN vw_dmdate ClassStartDate ON f.SKEnrolmentStartDate = ClassStartDate.SKDate

    JOIN vw_dmdate ClassEndDate ON f.SKEnrolmentEndDate = ClassEndDate.SKDate
    JOIN vw_dmcalendaryear cy ON f.SKYear = cy.SKYear

    AND cy.Year = 2022
    WHERE ClassEndDate.date > current_date() -- spark sql uses current_date() instead of GETDATE()
    AND s.SubjectShortName <> 'Unknown'
    ORDER BY
    AGEID, YearLevel, StudentFirstName, StudentLastName,Ceider

CREATE TEMP VIEW vw_activestudent
AS
SELECT SchoolID AS SchoolAGEID,
    LocationID AS LocationAGEID,
    c.CampusSuburbAndName,
    pd.FirstName,
    pd.LastName,
    yl.SKYearLevel,
    rg.RollGroupDesc AS RollGroup,
    pd.Ceider,
    pd.SKPerson

FROM vw_factpersonmilestone f
JOIN vw_dmpersondemographic pd ON f.SKPerson = pd.SKPerson
JOIN vw_dmcampus c ON f.SKCampus = c.SKCampus
JOIN vw_dmyearlevel yl ON f.SKYearLevel = yl.SKYearLevel
JOIN vw_dmrollgroup rg ON f.SKRollGroup = rg.SKRollGroup
WHERE 
    f.IsCurrentMilestone = 'True'
    AND f.IsActiveMilestone = 'True'
    AND pd.PersonType = 'Student'
ORDER BY SchoolAGEID, yl.YearLevelSifDesc, pd.FirstName, pd.LastName
#### Save the SQL Temp views created above

%%pyspark

# now save the sql views created above
classenrolment_df = spark.read.table('vw_classenrolment')
activestudent_df = spark.read.table('vw_activestudent')

saveToTarget(classenrolment_df, destination_p, f'{version}/_DMClassEnrolment')
saveToTarget(activestudent_df, destination_p, f'{version}/_FACTActiveStudent')
